name: FoxTrot (jgali001)
description:
FoxTrot is a 2D platformer Game where you run and jump through different obstacles and atop some foes to reach the level goal.  Avoid hazards like spikes, bottomless pits, cannons and falling traps that may crush you! Use your trusty home-run bat to bash enemies and find hidden areas. Collect gems and coins along the way to 100% each level.

Demo includes 2 fully playable levels and a boss battle stage.

Instructions are included with the download.
